text: I come here unfortunately about 2 times a week. My son has autism and has to have McDonald fries and apple juice. The staff is usually over the top nice or the complete opposite, I prefer the staff that have all their teeth .. really gotta wean my child off fries haha because I seriously hate Mcdonalds

Service was horrible food took an eternity to come out I figured it would be fresh since I was waiting so long and it was cold is a polar bear's toe nail there is no soda fountain inside so you have to wait 10 minutes for a refill on your drink I knew McDonald's was bad but I didn't think it would be anything like this

Don't usually go to Mcdonalds but I wanted a chocolate shake but the machine was not working properly and I had to wait in one of their spots and have it bought out but the manager came out and said that the chocolate  was not working so I got vanilla and then they forgot my sandwich but that was bought out also and hot and fresh off the grill so I was happy with the service and even got 2 cherries on my shake even though I don't like them lol

Stop going to this McDonald's because the homeless population at this location has increased. They hangout very close to cars at the drive thru. They yell and fight with each other. Makes it very unsafe for anyone at drive thru.

Clinton believe it I went there one time before I ordered just regular cheese burgers and they came out cold as ice and I asked them this time around I try it one more time I figured I'd call him and tell him that they were cold last time and I'll get one One today no no no I got another freaking cold one many times over three of them to be en

This Little McDonald's is a terrible, terrible McDonald's. It is so sad. I went to this McDonald's location. It was both my first time and my last time eating there. First of all, they have a sign that says "Restroom for customers only." As far as I am concerned, anyone who comes in the door is a potential customer. This sign is petty and selfish. I understand the need to lock the restrooms but this sign is heartless and unacceptable. Other McDonald's locations just lock the restrooms and give the customer a key and don't allow bags if there is a homeless population nearby. That is how it should be done at this location. I know it may be legal and their right to put up this sign. They need to be reminded that it is also legal and my right not to go to this McDonald's anymore because of this sign. It is my right to give this McDonald's a bad review because of it. There is nothing that this Little McDonald's can do about it. I have NEVER seen a sign like this at another McDonald's location. The soda machine is behind the counter. It is very inconvenient to get a soda this way. In addition, I ordered a plain hamburger. I specifically said that the hamburger should have nothing but the bun and the burger. I am not sure if the person who makes the food misunderstood the order or was simply thinking about his/her dream house and personal life. Anyway, they put cheese on the plain hamburger. A hamburger with cheese is not a hamburger. It is a cheeseburger. Perhaps the person who made the food is simply too stupid and incompetent to understand the difference. They also took around 10 minutes to complete the order and they still managed to get it wrong. I was actually impressed with their ability to screw up at this point. They are very good at screwing up. The person who made the food should receive a coaching. If he/she continues to mess the orders up, then he/she should receive progressive discipline. If he/she still continues to mess up, then he/she should be terminated with an "ineligible for rehire" status or transferred to another job at McDonald's. The manager of this McDonald's location should be terminated and not be eligible for rehire. The manager should be escorted off the property immediately to his/her vehicle by higher management and the McDonald's HR department. In fact, this Little McDonald's is such a terrible location that they should just shut down this location altogether. I WILL NEVER EAT AT THIS LITTLE MCDONALD'S LOCATION AGAIN!!! IT IS A BAD MCDONALD'S!!! THERE IS NO HOPE!!!!!!!!!!

This has to be the worst McDonald's I have ever been to.   I work across the street from this location and I've been there twice.  The first time I had to ask them for my order because so much time had lapsed.  I only get half hour for lunch.   The 2nd time I waited almost 10 minutes to be waited on, I left without placing my order.  I don't intend to go there ever again.

The managers and cashiers at this mcdonalds have really bad attitudes and the service here is usually unorganized especially the line but other then that each time I come here the food is always fresh so that's a plus but other then that nothing really to write home about.

This Mcdonald's is disgusting! !!! When I pulled up to pay the girl had the dirtiest fingernails. Then when I went to the second window for my food, the guys nails were even dirtier. If people are serving food they should at least have clean hands. I couldn't even eat the food I paid for.
Jayden loves play time!! He always wants his ice cream after he eats his meal!!!!! We come here a lot.

The lady taking orders was great. Normally this is a great location MUCH MUCH better than the one further down by strip
I think they were very shorthanded today

I can't believe how illiterate this manager was, I wanted just a simple chicken nugget of 40 piece for me and my friend. Plus one hot and spicy chicken sandwich plain with Mac sauce and lettuce. Manager didn't understand anything I said to him so he's argued with me about not wanting it plan so he can add all the crap on it with everything else. It's really simple just put plain on the screen and if your cook doesn't understand than he needs help.... All I got to say is shame on you and your staff for miss guiding my order and hope this place hires new people!
Always messing something up! No cheese..comes with cheese! Order fries..get no fries! Sugar cookies? Don't even ask after 8pm! Get it together!

Ive been going to this McDonald's for years ive never had a problem, as far as the homeless they all hang by the 7 11 stop lying live in this area yes there are a lot of homeless but they mind there business as far as the drive thru its quick an fresh always today tanya was awesome we got our order in less then a minute 3 double chesseburgers 2 fries

Worst place to eat and take your kids the cleaning lady makes you feel very uncomfortable..i am 9 months pregnant and she would not say excuse me or even more so she even bumped into me how ignorant can an employee be wow!
The employees are SOOO rude here. I asked for a chocolate milkshake and the response I got was "no chocolate shake." That's not even a complete sentence....and they want to make $15/hr. Ridiculous!

Always thought this McDonald's was disgusting! But they refurbished and renovated it they put into lines now people get out of their cars and scream and cause fights because they're saying their line is before you. Thanks McDonald's now you cause road rage at your drive-through by having 2 compete with who was first.

McDonald's is McDonald's like I honestly can't say too much about it other than the fact that I don't eat NOTHING but the breakfast sandwiches from here! 2 Sausage Egg McMuffin's for $3.33?! Oh Yeah! I'm always down! Count Me In! This location just happens to be close to the area I work in and I've stopped here from time to time! The drive thru is super fast so they get extra kudos and hand claps for that! My food is usually always fresh since it takes longer for them to get the breakfast items prepared! When I'm asked to park that's never an issue for me because I know it's going to be FRESH!

This is the worlds worst McDonald's, and I've been to the ones in Guam. Anyway, they made a Burger wrong so I drove back and they wouldn't fix it because I had thrown the burger away. As if I'm trying to finesse you out of a dollar burger, it's the principle. Also, the manager is rude and stupid and I've had bowel irritation for the past 6 days. I blame this

Welcome to your local homeless shelter and drug addicts meeting place. Watch as groups of filthy guys enter the bathrooms to exchange drugs several times in and out the same group of men right in front of restaurant management who pretend they don't see them. 
I hope you don't mind being panhandled while you eat or having someone in the booth behind you coughing on your neck. 
Don't expect the employees here to get your order with any sort of expediency, because they are busy handing out free cups of water or refilling the same soda cup that was dug out of the trash .
I wouldn't eat here , but I do suggest coming here just to witness how the employees pretend that they don't see the drug exchanges going on and don't see the panhandling right in front of them

This place is horrible, staff here are terrible.
Staff name Lafayela, with a black uniform has attitude toward customer. They forgot to put my sandwich in the bag so  I had go back there twice in 3 miles range. They say no sorry and the sandwich can not be cancelled because I purchased already. What a stupid statement is that?I did not get my food so I was trying cancel but they said I cant cuz it is mc donald's store policy. F$&k that. I am calling the corp office to find out that is true.

This is the worst Mcdonald I have been ever.
Mc nugget was not fully cooked. I order 10 pieces of mc nugget, I found this happening after I got home and I threw it away. Also, the big mac bread was so wet. This mcdonald is insane. Do not go there !!! Anywhere beside this place would be much better choice.

So, they only have this "country style lemonade available for 1.69....nearly double the regular drink price. We finish it, i tell my kids to get hi-c for a refill, but the customer service refused saying they don't refill that kind of cup. What garbage.  I didn't even know that's what I paid for.

I had to go through he drive through.... I hate the drive through because I don't want to be Leo Gets.  Well, call me Leo!  The girl on the speaker didn't know what a #1 combo was.  Even when I posted it on my Facebook asking if anyone knew what a #1 combo was, they all got it!  Then I got my food. But wasn't till I got back to work to find my fries 1/2 gone even before I got to them.  To add to the misery, they were very cold.  And they want a raise to $15.00/hour????  I don't think so!

Everybody knows whats what when it comes to McDonalds, i would've thought it worthless to write a review for a fast food chain but i particularly had to do this one for a reason. This McDonalds in particular had a customer appreciation thing going on that was great, i can positively say that i hadn't seen it in any other McDonalds. They had daily specials and some of them were pretty good, like 2 Big Macs for five dollars. Unfortunately they aren't having these anymore but i thought it was ver worthy of mentioning. Also, the drive thru for this location is kinda wierd.

'MANUEL IS A BEAUTIFUL FAG'
Is what this locations white board says in clear public view with a manager on duty. I'm soo upset by this I've called corporate & reaching out to the gay community. 
This is BEYOND wrong!!!
I've boycotted. I go there bout 2x's a week however NEVER AGAIN!
I'll use the location on W. Flamingo 
C the photos I've posted.
This place needs diversity classes ASAP!!

This Mc Donald's has GREAT customer service !!! I was a little short short of money to pay for my breakfast but the morning manager said it was okay don't worry about it and gave me my meal anyway  :)

I cannot believe how disgusting this place is! There was a fucking bug in my wifes caramel frappe!! See for yourself guys and be careful! I dont know who the fuck did my orders but I hope you get your shit handed to you!! My wife almost swallowed this fucking thing you dumb bitches! I hope you fucking lose your job!! We lost our appetite because of this piece of shit!!
Ordered 8 sausage mc.muffins and every single one was old like it had been sitting in their tray for a while and burnt!!!!you parked me and didn't give me fresh food ?! Horrible!!!!
This place has been renovated and I think the staff has too!  Great job!!! Yelp thinks this review is too short.... have you ever heard of short and sweet?
Bad attitudes and rude behavior from both employees, one was the manager. I'll be avoiding this McD's from here on out.

Decided to try the Carmel macchiato, and it tastes so watered down it's so gross!!! 

Filled a large fry barely half way, and forgot our sodas really annoyed. Took longer than it should have to correct the issues.

For the most part, I don't normally have issues with this location. They always get the order right tho. The 2 biggest complaints about this location is the slow speed of the staff on making the food and most of the drive-thru staff are not very friendly. The order taker is ok but the money taker is usually not friendly at all and really doesn't seem to want to be there. The food giver is generally friendly tho. They have gotten my order wrong once but that was in the drive thru. Other than that, it's ur typical McDonald's.

When we first walked into this McDonalds last night, it was definitely a nicer looking establishment vs other ones that I've seen in the past. Unfortunately my first impression was ruined by the unnecessarily rude lady behind the counter. Besides our french fries being delivered cold, I was surprised to hear "that they weren't serving ice cream at night". Then the guy behind me somehow gets a McFlurry. When I asked why, they said that was their last one. So why didn't I get the last one if he was behind me?

Nothing like going through the drive thru as the only person and still having them mess the order up. I ordered 2 egg white delights and instead was surprised after getting to my destination with 2 plain old egg mcmuffins. To complete my order of dissatisfaction, I paid over $6 for these sloppily made jems. This will complete my ordering at this dive.  Oh and the one star is simply because I cannot give a zero star rating.
